QuestData.Title: Escape From Shaz'gul
QuestData.Description: I've failed, $n...$B$BMy squadron was caught by a wandering patrol. We fought fiercely, but the alarm had been raised. The rangari forced me into hiding before surrendering themselves to the enemy.$B$BThey were under MY command, and they gave their lives... for what? I... I'm not sure what to do, $n.$B$BWe need to get out of here, but how?
QuestData.RewardText: I could never have done it without you, $n. Your words unlocked something within me which I have not felt before.$B$BCall it what you wish - resolve, conviction, faith. I will not soon forget this, $c.
